title: hashtag360
blurb: instagram but 360 with an option to "hang out" in the picture
content_html:
Inspiration

We wanted to give our friends a fuller exerince of our facebook and instagram pics

What it does

How I built it

We just did it!

Challenges I ran into

It took us some time to integrate A-frame with AngularJS and... then with firebase and socket.io

Accomplishments that I'm proud of

We overcame the challenges that we listed above

What I learned

We learnt how to use A-Frame and WebGL

What's next for hashtag360

commercialize it and build and Pro version for businesses as VR collaboration tool
